discussion.content: The answer is incorrect. It needs to be based on the 'last modification' otherwise every high priority case will be escalated after 3 hours of being created. Even the ones who are already been taken care of.

C is correct because escalation rules in Salesforce are specifically designed to manage case response time requirements. D. Delegated administrators have limited administrative privileges and may not be able to perform all administrative duties.

Option B (The System Administrator profile is unavailable under the Salesforce Platform license) is not a valid reason as the System Administrator profile is available for all Salesforce licenses that include administrative access.
